ru.curs.celesta.dbutils.adaptors

Class OraAdaptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.curs.celesta.dbutils.adaptors.DBAdaptor
      • ru.curs.celesta.dbutils.adaptors.OraAdaptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StaticDataAdaptor, QueryBuildingHelper

    public final class OraAdaptor
extends DBAdaptor
    Oracle Database Adaptor.
